web_snippets: Daniel Swift. Assistant Professor. B.A., University of Oxford Ph.D., Columbia University. Office: Palamountain 335. Phone: (518) 580-8395
Daniel Swift is the author of books on Shakespeare, Ezra Pound, and the poetry of the Second World War, and the editor of the poems of John Berryman.
Biography. Dr Daniel Swift is Associate Professor in English. He has a BA from Oxford University and a PhD from Columbia University in New York.
